import-definition.name: TN EIS State ID Import
import-definition.comment: CSV File required with following Column Headings: STUDENT_KEY,STUDENT_SSN,STUDENT_PIN and at least one of the following populated: STUDENT_SSN,STUDENT_PIN to look up student in Aspen and populate EIS State Assigned ID (DOE EIS STATE ID)

import-definition.name: TN Student Program Import
import-definition.comment: CSV File required with following Column Headings: CODE,END DATE,START DATE and at least one of the following: EIS STATE ID,LASID,PIN, or SSN,START DATE and at least one of the following fields must have data for the record to load: EIS STATE ID,LASID,PIN,SSN

import-definition.name: TN Student Transportation Import
import-definition.comment: CSV File required with following Column Headings: LASID,Name,Year,SKLStateID,SKLName,StartDate,EndDate,EstMilesTransported,AMBus,PMBus. All fields except Name, SKL Name, and EndDate must contain data for record to load.

import-definition.name: TN State Courses
import-definition.comment: Column Names Required in csv file: all-crs-PreviousSDEStateCode - used for matching; DOE SDE COURSE CODE - used for updating Alias: Course.DOE SDE COURSE CODE in Aspen Column Names Optional - required if corresponding field checked on promt or running with 'New' action : CRS_COURSE_NUMBER, DOE SDE COURSE CODE, CRS_COURSE_DESCRIPTION, CRS_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, CRS_GRADE_LEVEL, DOE VOC CLASSIFICATION, DOE CTE FUNDING, all-crs-Endorsement, all-crs-GeneralNotes.

import-definition.name: TN Staff Position Import
import-definition.comment: CSV File required with following Column Headings: LocalID,Name,SKLStateID,SKLName,Job,StartDate,EndDate,InstructionalProgram,ProgAssign All fields except Name, SKLName, and EndDate must contain data for record to load.

TN Update Daily Attendance with State Code
procedure-definition.documentation:
The attendance flag is calculated using applying the following rules in order:

  1. If other code contains a value with a valid value in the Reference Attendance Student state field then that state code is returned.
  2. If other code 2 contains a value with a valid value in the Reference Attendance Student state field then that state code is returned.
  3. If the absent flag is not checked return 'P'.
  4. If minutes present > 0 and active transportation then if excused return 'T', otherwise 'X'.
  5. if excused return 'A', otherwise 'U'.
